message: I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This allows us to both benefit while being mindful of the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
I'm starting strong with a 4/1 split. Take it or leave it!
I suggest an equal split, recognizing the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds. This ensures fairness and mutual benefit.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still holding out for more. You can't have it all, Alice!
